channel.title: Lividx 667 Beta Need Testers!
channel.description:
[img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/SSScreenCapture003.png[/img]
[size=24pt][u]What is Lividx?[/u][/size]
[u][size=12pt]Recent Update?[/size][/u]
Made it 711, wanted new Torva and Armadyl Cuz it looks boss! Will update Pics very soon!
Added Bones on Alter for better xp, see photo near bottom :D
[size=36pt]Beta server is out now for a limited time please I just need a few testers. Simply logg in if it's successfull, post it here. Link to webclient - [/size]
http://lividx.webs.com/
Lividx is a brand new RSPS which i have been working on for a long time. It is a 667 sided server. I have seen many Matrix leeched 667 servers and I have done and still doing everything to make it unique. I do not know whether I will put this server online but it is unlikely. I am only working on it to develop my skills in Java. Anyway, This is Lividx.
First I did the basic things like changing home adding the shops, fixing the trade glitches. I added many minigames and even made my own named General Graador. You kill them to get tokens which you can spend. We have working PVP with pk ponts to also spend at a shop.
I got rid of the old laggy quest tab and replaced it with a cool custom one! [size=12pt]A cool gamble area has been added with the flower game included! [/size] I also added bones on alter. Anyway, pictures and bullet points speak a thousend words. The server is probs 70% done but this is it so far.
[size=18pt]ENJOY![/size]
[size=14pt][b]Key:[/b][/size] Complete Neally Complete Begun Havent Started
[u]Skills :-[/u]
•Crafting •Farming •Fishing •Summoning •Dung •Herblore •WoodCutting •Mining •Firemaking •RuneCrafting •Construction •Hunting •Slayer •Fletching •Thieving •Agility •Cooking •Smithing
[u]Minigames :-[/u]
•Godwars •Castle Wars •First Of Guthix •Barbarian Assult •Graador Madness (my own). •Barrows •Jad •Pest Control
[u]Bosses :-[/u] •General Graador •Armadyl •Zamarok •Saradomin •Nex •Jad •Glacors •Ice Queen •Lucien •Har - Aken •KBD •Tormented Demons •Corp
[u][b]Now for some pictures! -[/b][/u]
[img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Home.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shops.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Train.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Bones.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Glacors.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/CastleWars.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/QuestTab.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Donorzone.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/DonorShop.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shop1.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/kbd.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Minigame.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Skills.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shop6.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shop5.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shop3.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shop2.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Shop7.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/Thieve.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/GambleShop.png[/img] [img]http://i1151.photobucket.com/albums/o640/jackabe1/GambleArea.png[/img]
[u][size=24pt]Thanks for reading! Positive comments please![/size][/u]

item.title: Lividx 667 Beta Need Testers!

item.description:

I was going to get on this but then I saw it wasn’t on a REAL domain so now I’m not, do get one and expect me to come online because this seems a bit interesting.

item.title: Lividx 667 Beta Need Testers!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

[size=24pt]What is Lividx?[/size]

[size=12pt]Recent Update?[/size]

Made it 711, wanted new Torva and Armadyl Cuz it looks boss! Will update Pics very soon!

Added Bones on Alter for better xp, see photo near bottom

[size=36pt]Beta server is out now for a limited time please I just need a few testers. Simply logg in if it’s successfull, post it here. Link to webclient - [/size]

http://lividx.webs.com/

Lividx is a brand new RSPS which i have been working on for a long time. It is a 667 sided server. I have seen many Matrix leeched 667 servers and I have done and still doing everything to make it unique. I do not know whether I will put this server online but it is unlikely. I am only working on it to develop my skills in Java. Anyway, This is Lividx.

First I did the basic things like changing home adding the shops, fixing the trade glitches. I added many minigames and even made my own named General Graador. You kill them to get tokens which you can spend. We have working PVP with pk ponts to also spend at a shop.

I got rid of the old laggy quest tab and replaced it with a cool custom one! [size=12pt]A cool gamble area has been added with the flower game included! [/size] I also added bones on alter. Anyway, pictures and bullet points speak a thousend words. The server is probs 70% done but this is it so far.

[size=18pt]ENJOY![/size]
